name: Cameo
description: Absolutely adorable silver cameo rings! They're silver plastic, but look like metal. Although not quite an actual cameo, they feature a girl's profile, and have decorate leaves around her picture. These buttons were found in an antique shop! Measurements: Small: 13/16" across the center Large: 1-1/4" across the center Color band: - Gold - Silver - Sterling Silver (no extra charge!) *When you make your payment, you will need to include a Note To Seller specifying which color band you would like for your ring, and what size you are. If you do not specify, you will receive an email. Your reply will be needed before your order can be processed. All of my rings are made from strictly true vintage buttons (20+ years old!), and one-of-a-kind stones/minerals. I use permanently colored copper wire or sterling silver to wrap them. I wrap my rings very tight and neatly so you can expect a very beautiful carefully created ring. There are usually only 1-4 of each specific button at any given time, so be sure to grab it while you can! **The last image depicts what your ring will look like when finished. Click the images to view larger.

name: Pearlescent & Gold Knots
description: These are very unique buttons that are going to make absolutely stunning rings! They're all plastic, but very shiny, and have a plastic pearlescent bead center. It'll definitely catch the light and draw attention, and of course look amazing on your finger. They were found in an antique shop! Measurements: 3/4" across the center Color band: - Gold - Silver - Sterling Silver (no extra charge!) *When you make your payment, you will need to include a Note To Seller specifying which color band you would like for your ring, and what size you are.
